name: Bach In Time
description:
Welcome to Bach in Time.  If you play this game and press enter you won't accidentally summon a time wizard who will send you back in an edutaining journey about musical terms.  Time wizard's honor.  But if that does somehow happen to you, just type the vocab terms in time to return home to 2020.  It can't be that hard....

Created for the      VimJam: Collectables (8 Bits to Infinity)

Recommended to play game in a google chrome browser.  Don't forget to type in time!
